effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.3 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 652,534.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

name: Algari Alchemist Stone

spells.description: Equip: When you heal or deal damage you have a chance to increase your Strength, Agility, or Intellect by 15,260 for 15 sec. Your highest stat is always chosen.
Equip: Increases the effect that healing and mana potions have on the wearer by 40%.  This effect does not stack.

description: Can be used for transmutations in place of a Philosopher's Stone.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 598,908 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.
